com.konakartadmin.app

Class AdminPromotion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.konakartadmin.app.AdminPromotion

  • public class AdminPromotion
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Promotion class - it contains information about the promotion; links it to the Order Total module that is used to calculate the promotion, and identifies to what products and customers the promotion applies.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean active
      Boolean that defines whether the promotion is active

      • active

        private boolean active
        Boolean that defines whether the promotion is active

      • cumulative

        private boolean cumulative
        Boolean that defines whether the promotion is cumulative with other promotions. Otherwise we always use the promotion that gives the biggest discount

      • requiresCoupon

        private boolean requiresCoupon
        Promotion requires a coupon

      • totalMaxUse

        private int totalMaxUse
        The maximum number of times that the promotion can be used

      • timesUsed

        private int timesUsed
        The number of times that the promotion has been used

      • inTestMode

        private boolean inTestMode
        When a promotion is read through the KonaKart APIs, the inTestMode attribute is set if the promotion is in test mode. A promotion is considered to be in test mode if the Expression Id of the test expression if added to the promotion. The test expression is an expression used by the promotion when in test mode to activate it for only a certain number of test users. The name of the expression is defined by a configuration variable.

      • setTestMode

        private java.lang.Boolean setTestMode
        This Boolean is used whenever a promotion is inserted or edited. The possible values are:
        • Null - No action is taken
        • True - If a test expression exists, then it is added to the promotion
        • False - The test expression is removed from the promotion

      • customerRule

        private int customerRule
        The rule for allowing customers to use the promotion. The rule parameter can take the following values:
        • AdminPromotionMgr.EXCLUDE. Exclude some customers from the promotion
        • AdminPromotionMgr.ALL. Include all customers in the promotion
        • AdminPromotionMgr.INCLUDE. Include some customers in the promotion

        • customerGroupRule

          private int customerGroupRule
          The rule for allowing customers belonging to customer groups to use the promotion. The rule parameter can take the following values:
          • AdminPromotionMgr.EXCLUDE. Exclude some customer groups from the promotion
          • AdminPromotionMgr.ALL. Include all customer groups in the promotion
          • AdminPromotionMgr.INCLUDE. Include some customer groups in the promotion

          • categoryRule

            private int categoryRule
            The rule for allowing products only from certain categories in the promotion. The rule parameter can take the following values:
            • AdminPromotionMgr.EXCLUDE. Exclude some categories from the promotion
            • AdminPromotionMgr.ALL. Include all categories in the promotion
            • AdminPromotionMgr.INCLUDE. Include some categories in the promotion

            • manufacturerRule

              private int manufacturerRule
              The rule for allowing products only from certain manufacturers in the promotion. The rule parameter can take the following values:
              • AdminPromotionMgr.EXCLUDE. Exclude some manufacturers from the promotion
              • AdminPromotionMgr.ALL. Include all manufacturers in the promotion
              • AdminPromotionMgr.INCLUDE. Include some manufacturers in the promotion

              • productRule

                private int productRule
                The rule for allowing only certain products in the promotion. The rule parameter can take the following values:
                • AdminPromotionMgr.EXCLUDE. Exclude some products from the promotion
                • AdminPromotionMgr.ALL. Include all products in the promotion
                • AdminPromotionMgr.INCLUDE. Include some products in the promotion

                  public boolean isActive()

                • getStatus

                  public boolean getStatus(java.util.Date storeTime)
                  Returns the status of the object. In order to calculate whether the promotion is active, the following are used:
                  • The start and end dates which are compared to the current store time
                  • The number of times the promotion has been used
                  • The active attribute of the promotion (e.g. isActive()). If this is false then by default the promotion is not active.
                  Parameters:
                  storeTime - The current storeTime which is used to compare with the start and end dates of the promotion. If null then the standard time of the server is used.
                  Returns:
                  Returns the status of the object.
